Excel_97_SDK/

This is available from

http://download.microsoft.com/download/excel97win/Install/1.0/W9XNT4XP/EN-US/excel97sdk.exe

Copy excel97sdk.exe to this directory, CD there and run.

It will most likely suggest unpacking to

'C:\Excel 97 SDK Downloaded Files'

Copy the INCLUDE directory from there to this directory.

Alternatively, CD to this directory and specify . as the directory to unzip to.

NB Fireworkz only uses XLCALL.H from the INCLUDE directory.
